name: AIOUG Chennai Chapter Oct 2016 Meet

venue.name: Tech Mahindra
venue.address_1: No. 602/3, ELCOT SEZ 138, SEZ Avenue, Elcot Sez,Sholinganallur

group.name: All India Oracle Users Group - Chennai Chapter

description:
AIOUG Chennai Chapter - Oct 2016 Meet - Tech Day Event

Link to Register 

http://www.meraevents.com/event/aioug-chennai-chapter-tech-day?ucode=organizer


Note - RSVP alone in meetup does not confirm your seat, Kindly register using the above link and generate your delegate pass. 

Delegate Pass plus  Confirmation Email from AIOUG are mandatory. 

Agenda

08:45 AM - Registration Checkin (No Spot Registration)


09:00 AM - AIOUG - Sangam16 Updates - By Hariharaputhran Vaithinathan


09:15 AM  - Oracle(12c) Rest Data Services Overview - By Justin Michael Raj


10:15 AM - Tea Break


10:45 AM - Oracle SQL Tuning - By Hariharaputhran Vaithinathan and  Midhun Gandhi

12:45 PM - Lunch


02:00 PM - Oracle Cloud Overview - By Harish P and  Hariharaputhran Vaithinathan


03:00 PM - Replicate from RDBMS to Non-RDBMS - By Veeratteshwaran Sridhar 


04:00 PM - Wrap!

name: Sangam16 - Largest Independent Oracle Users Group Conference in India

group.name: All India Oracle Users Group - Chennai Chapter

description:
SANGAM is the Largest Independent Oracle Users Group Conference in India, organised annually in the month of November.  

We're hosting this year's Sangam (Sangam16 - 8th Annual Oracle Users Group Conference) in Crowne Plaza Bengaluru Electronics City on Friday 11th & Saturday 12th November 2016.

For more details - www.sangam16.com
